content: Hi I am from United Health Group. Your pipes qualify for a free inspection and gift card. Please provide your address and full name to claim!
Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. Could you please provide your name so we can assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs?
Reply with your address so we can process your free rewards, or you may miss out. We just need a few details to send the prepaid card.
It appears your inquiry may not be related to a home service request. If you need help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC jobs, please let us know!
reason: Interaction was determined to be spam.
